item.title: EP 966 - Hans Wormhat's Newest Conspiracy: Steampunk Was Real!
item.itunes:title: Hans Wormhat Newest Conspiracy: Steampunk Was Real!
item.description:
Today we find out that some ghosts can stop tragic accidents, and then we once again enter the mind of Hans Wormhat to find out that steampunk was real!

 

Fan Art Friday Art by Robert Paulsen

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

https://deadrabbitradio.pods.monster/doku.php?id=Welcome
